title: Disambiguation of acronyms in clinical narratives with large language models
details: A Kugic, S Schulz, M Kreuzthaler - Journal of the American Medical Informatics …, 2024
abstract: Objective To assess the performance of large language models (LLMs) for zero-shot disambiguation of acronyms in clinical narratives. Materials and Methods Clinical narratives in English, German, and Portuguese were applied for testing the …
